name: Homestar Runner: Halloween Hide n' Seek
name_original: Homestar Runner: Halloween Hide n' Seek
description:
In this short, retro-style point n' click game, it's Halloween night and all of Homestar Runner's pals have hidden from him so he can't see their costumes. Explore 9 different locations - collecting items, solving puzzles, and talking to characters - as you help Homestar find all 11 of his dumb animal character friends so he can totally misinterpret their costumes like he always does!

It's like playing a Homestar Runner Halloween cartoon! That's a good thing, right?!



Featuring 100's of lines of FULLY VOICED dialog from your fave/not-fave characters from Homestar Runner dot com!

An optional Secret Quest to complete which unlocks a hidden easter egg.

All the humor, portmanteaus, and self-indulgent, self-referential jokes you'd expect from Homestar Runner content.
